data.title: When Your Relationship Ends (WYRE) Support Group
data.meta_description: Eight-week program for healing and recovering from separation, divorce or the end of a relationship.
data.text:
Beginning Wednesday, June 26, 2019 for 8 weeks offered through The Center For Relationships:

4210 Spicewood Springs, Suite 201, Austin, Texas 78759

512-465-2926

The end of a committed relationship can be a life shattering experience. Whether sudden or in the making for years, circumstances vary but one thing is constant; it is an opportunity for personal growth and change. In this program participants will work through group exercises and progress toward healing, rebuilding trust &recovery from separation, divorce, or the ending of a relationship. Join us in a structured 8-Week program in an intimate group setting for people experiencing the end of a long-term relationship or marriage based on Rebuilding When Your Relationship Ends (W.Y.R.E.) by Bruce Fisher.

Facilitated by: Toya Foster, Licensed Professional Counselor-Intern

Open to anyone needing help through the group process to move forward in healing and rebuilding their life.

For more information and registration visit: https://tcfr-atx.regfox.com/rebuilding-when-your-relationship-ends

This group is a continuation of the W.Y.R.E. Group offered for many years by Dr. Larry Miller in Austin, TX.

Pre- Group Screening via phone will be required prior to joining

“Many books on divorce only talk about the problems… Dr. Bruce Fisher has given us a very practical and useful framework within which to examine… the life that comes after the divorce. He presents it as a period in which one can learn from the past, get to know oneself better and to help to develop new parts of the self that were previously unknown.”– Virginia Satir, MSW
